CustomField.formula: IF(INCLUDES( $User.Skills_Sales__c , "Paid Digital"), "Paid Digital", NULL) + BR() + IF(INCLUDES( $User.Skills_Sales__c , "Closer"), "Closer", NULL) + BR() + IF(INCLUDES( $User.Skills_Sales__c , "Manager"), "Manager", NULL) + BR() + IF(INCLUDES( $User.Skills_Sales__c , "Finance"), "Finance", NULL) + BR() + IF(INCLUDES( $User.Skills_Sales__c , "Corp Upsales"), "Corp Upsales", NULL) + BR() + IF(INCLUDES( $User.Skills_Sales__c , "Merchant"), "Merchant", NULL) + BR() + IF(INCLUDES( $User.Skills_Sales__c , "Dissolution"), "Dissolution", NULL) + BR() + IF(INCLUDES( $User.Skills_Sales__c , "CAP"), "CAP", NULL) + BR() + IF(INCLUDES( $User.Skills_Sales__c , "Cross-Sale"), "Cross-Sales", NULL) + BR() + IF(INCLUDES( $User.Skills_Sales__c , "ClientbooksConsult"), "ClientbooksConsult", NULL) + BR() + IF(INCLUDES( $User.Skills_Sales__c , "Clientbooks Cross-Sell"), "Clientbooks Cross-Sell", NULL) + BR() + IF(INCLUDES( $User.Skills_Sales__c , "Entity Formation Sales"), "Entity Formation Sales", NULL) + BR() + IF(INCLUDES( $User.Skills_Sales__c , "Equip Sales"), "Equip Sales", NULL) + BR() + IF(INCLUDES( $User.Skills_Sales__c , "Equip Setter"), "Equip Setter", NULL) + BR() + IF(INCLUDES( $User.Skills_Sales__c, "CBCSched"), "CBCSched", NULL)
